Plot: A graduate student (Nicholson) copes with a recent breakup by conducting interviews with various men.
Title: Brief Interviews with Hideous Men
Writer: John Krasinski (screenplay), David Foster Wallace (story collection)
Actors: Julianne Nicholson, Ben Shenkman, Timothy Hutton, Michael Cerveris
tomatoConsensus: Ambitious but uneven, John Krasinski's adaptation of David Foster Wallace's Brief Interviews with Hideous Men tries hard but doesn't match the depth of the book.
